vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.9.21;
son of: Meshelemiah (H4920);
brother of: Jediael (H3043J), Zebadiah (H2069J), Jathniel (H3496), Elam (H5867H), Jehohanan (H3076I) and Eliehoenai (H0454A)
§ Zechariah = "Jehovah remembers"
1) king of Israel, son of Jeroboam II
2) son of Meshelemiah of Shelemiah, a Korhite, and keeper of the north gate of the tabernacle of the congregation
3) one of the sons of Jehiel
4) a Levite of the second order in the temple band in the time of David
5) one of the princes of Judah in the reign of Jehoshaphat
6) son of the high priest Jehoiada, in the reign of Joash king of Judah, who was stoned in the court of the temple
7) a Kohathite Levite in the reign of Josiah
8) the leader of the sons of Pharosh who returned with Ezra
9) son of Bebai
10) one of the chiefs of the people whom Ezra summoned in council at the river Ahava; stood at Ezra's left hand when Ezra expounded the law to the people
11) one of the family of Elam who had married a foreign wife after the captivity
12) ancestor of Athaiah or Uthai
13) a Shilonite, descendant of Perez, grandfather of Athaiah
14) a priest, son of Pashur
15) the representative of the priestly family of Iddo in the days of Joiakim the son of Jeshua; possibly the same as 1 above
16) one of the priests, son of Jonathan, who blew with the trumpets at the dedication of the city wall by Ezra and Nehemiah
17) a chief of the Reubenites at the time of the captivity by Tiglath-pileser
18) one of the priests who accompanied the ark from the house of Obed-edom
19) son of Isshiah of Jesiah, a Kohathite Levite descended from Uzziel
20) 4th son of Hosah, of the children of Merari
21) a Manassite, father of Iddo
22) father of Jahaziel. He prophesied in the spirit
23) one of the sons of Jehoshaphat
24) a prophet in the reign of Uzziah, who appears to have acted as the king's counsellor, but of whom nothing is known
25) father of Abijah or Abi, Hezekiah's mother
26) one of the family of Asaph in the reign of Hezekiah
27) one of the rulers of the temple in the reign of Josiah
28) son of Jeberechiah who was taken by the prophet Isaiah as one of the 'faithful witnesses to record' when he wrote concerning Maher-shalal-hash-baz
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) זְכַרָיָהוּ   hijo de Jeroboam; rey de Israel ; (b) ִזְכַרָיָהוּ   suegro del rey Ahaz; (c) זְכַרָיָהוּ   varios hombres; tribu de Leví; (d) זֶכֶר   hijo de Jehiel; tribu de Benjamín; (e)   funcionario; en tiempos de Josafat; (f)   profeta; (g)   varios hombres; en tiempos de Esdras y Nehemías ; (a) זְכַרָיָה   hijo de Jeroboam; rey de Israel; (b)   hombre; tribu de Rubén; (c) זְכַרָיָה   sacerdote; en tiempos del rey David; (d)   hijo de Meselemías; portero; tribu de Leví; (e)   padre de Idó, jefe; tribu de Manasés; en tiempos de David; (f)   hijo de Benaías; levita; en tiempos del rey Josafat; (g)   hijo de Josafat, rey de Judá; (h)   profeta; en tiempos de Uzías; (i) זְכַרָיָה   suegro del rey Ahaz; (j)   levita; en tiempos del rey Ezequías; (k)   levita; en tiempos del rey Josías; (l)   hijo de Jeberequías; en tiempos del profeta Isaías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒迦利亞 或 撒迦利雅 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華記念"
1) 以色列王, 耶羅波安二世的兒子 (王下 14:29)(王下 15:8)
2) 希西家王的外祖父 (代下29:1)
3) 耶比利家的兒子,也是當先知以賽亞記下"瑪黑珥-沙拉勒-哈斯-罷斯"所指稱的
"誠實見證人"(賽 8:1)
4) 在被提革拉-毗尼色擄去的被擄時期,流便支派的一族長 (代上 5:7)
5) 一名便雅憫人 (代上9:37)
6) 瑪拿西人, 易多的父親 (代上 27:21)
7) 約沙法眾子之一 (代下 21:2)
8) 約沙法的手下官員 (代下17:7)
9) 烏西雅王執政時先知之一, 以王的顧問身份出現, 但其他事不可知 (代下 26:5)
10) 於大衛時期,在聖殿樂團第二隊的利未人(代上 15:18)
11) 利未人伊示雅的子孫 (代上 24:25)
12) 利未人米施利米雅之子(代上 26:2),示利米雅的兒子(代上 26:14)
13) 利未人何薩的兒子 (代上26:11)
14) 利未人雅哈悉的父親. 雅哈悉曾受感說預言 (代下 20:14)
15) 利未人,是希西家執政時亞薩的子孫之一 (代下 29:13)
16) 利未人,是會幕北門的看守者 (代上 9:21)
17) 利未人,哥轄族的後代 (代下34:12)
18) 利未人,亞薩後裔約拿單之子, 在以斯拉和尼希米獻城牆時吹號 (尼 12:35)
19) 陪同約櫃從俄別以東回來的祭司之一 (代上 15:24)
20) 約西亞時代,管理聖殿的一名祭司 (代下35:8)
21) 大祭司耶何耶大的兒子, 猶大約阿施王掌權時期在聖殿的院內被石頭打死 (代下 24:20)
22) 被擄歸回後,住在耶路撒冷的一名祭司 (尼11:12)
23) 被擄歸回後,為慶祝城牆落成的稱謝隊伍中的一名祭司 (尼12:41)
24) 眾所皆知的先知 (撒迦利亞書)
25) 當以斯拉宣讀律法時,站在以斯拉的左手邊(尼 8:3)
26) 以攔的孩子之一(以攔是在被擄後娶外邦女子) (拉 10:26)
27) 被擄歸回的族長比拜的兒子 (拉8:11)
28) 猶大人,法勒斯的子孫, 亞他雅的祖父 (尼 11:4)
29) 猶大人,示羅尼的兒子 (尼11:5)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
撒迦利亚 或 撒迦利雅 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华记念"
1) 以色列王, 耶罗波安二世的儿子 (王下 14:29)(王下 15:8)
2) 希西家王的外祖父 (代下29:1)
3) 耶比利家的儿子,也是当先知以赛亚记下"玛黑珥-沙拉勒-哈斯-罢斯"所指称的
"诚实见证人"(赛 8:1)
4) 在被提革拉-毗尼色掳去的被掳时期,流便支派的一族长 (代上 5:7)
5) 一名便雅悯人 (代上9:37)
6) 玛拿西人, 易多的父亲 (代上 27:21)
7) 约沙法众子之一 (代下 21:2)
8) 约沙法的手下官员 (代下17:7)
9) 乌西雅王执政时先知之一, 以王的顾问身份出现, 但其他事不可知 (代下 26:5)
10) 于大卫时期,在圣殿乐团第二队的利未人(代上 15:18)
11) 利未人伊示雅的子孙 (代上 24:25)
12) 利未人米施利米雅之子(代上 26:2),示利米雅的儿子(代上 26:14)
13) 利未人何萨的儿子 (代上26:11)
14) 利未人雅哈悉的父亲. 雅哈悉曾受感说预言 (代下 20:14)
15) 利未人,是希西家执政时亚萨的子孙之一 (代下 29:13)
16) 利未人,是会幕北门的看守者 (代上 9:21)
17) 利未人,哥辖族的后代 (代下34:12)
18) 利未人,亚萨后裔约拿单之子, 在以斯拉和尼希米献城墙时吹号 (尼 12:35)
19) 陪同约柜从俄别以东回来的祭司之一 (代上 15:24)
20) 约西亚时代,管理圣殿的一名祭司 (代下35:8)
21) 大祭司耶何耶大的儿子, 犹大约阿施王掌权时期在圣殿的院内被石头打死 (代下 24:20)
22) 被掳归回后,住在耶路撒冷的一名祭司 (尼11:12)
23) 被掳归回后,为庆祝城墙落成的称谢队伍中的一名祭司 (尼12:41)
24) 众所皆知的先知 (撒迦利亚书)
25) 当以斯拉宣读律法时,站在以斯拉的左手边(尼 8:3)
26) 以拦的孩子之一(以拦是在被掳后娶外邦女子) (拉 10:26)
27) 被掳归回的族长比拜的儿子 (拉8:11)
28) 犹大人,法勒斯的子孙, 亚他雅的祖父 (尼 11:4)
29) 犹大人,示罗尼的儿子 (尼11:5)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.5.1;
son of: Berechiah (H1296L)
Aramaic of ze.khar.yah (זְכַרְיָה "Zechariah" H2148v)
§ Zechariah = "Jehovah remembers"
11th in order of the minor prophets; a priest, son of Berechiah and grandson of Iddo, who, along with Haggai, directed the rebuilding of the temple in the days of Zerubbabel

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.18.2;

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.5.1;
son of: Berechiah (H1296L)
Also named: ze.khar.yah (זְכַרְיָהוּ "Zechariah" H2148B)
§ Zechariah = "Jehovah remembers"
11th in order of the minor prophets; a priest, son of Berechiah and grandson of Iddo, who, along with Haggai, directed the rebuilding of the temple in the days of Zerubbabel

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.24.20;
son of: Jehoiada (H3077H)
Also named: Zacharias<\i> (Ζαχαρίας "Zechariah" G2197)
§ Zechariah = "Jehovah remembers"
11th in order of the minor prophets; a priest, son of Berechiah and grandson of Iddo, who, along with Haggai, directed the rebuilding of the temple in the days of Zerubbabel

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.31;
son of: Abiel (H0022) and Maacah (H4601N);
brother of: Kish (H7027), Ner (H5369), Abdon (H5658J), Zur (H6698I), Baal (H1168B), Nadab (H5070J), Gedor (H1446I), Ahio (H0283I) and Mikloth (H4732); also called Zechariah at 1Ch.9.37;
Another name of ze.kher (זֶ֫כֶר "Zecher" H2144)
§ Zechariah = "Jehovah remembers"
11th in order of the minor prophets; a priest, son of Berechiah and grandson of Iddo, who, along with Haggai, directed the rebuilding of the temple in the days of Zerubbabel

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.12.41
§ Zechariah = "Jehovah remembers"
11th in order of the minor prophets; a priest, son of Berechiah and grandson of Iddo, who, along with Haggai, directed the rebuilding of the temple in the days of Zerubbabel

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Isa.8.2;
son of: Jeberechiah (H3000)
§ Zechariah = "Jehovah remembers"
11th in order of the minor prophets; a priest, son of Berechiah and grandson of Iddo, who, along with Haggai, directed the rebuilding of the temple in the days of Zerubbabel
